name: moss stitch fingerless gloves
sizes_available: women's small-men's large (7-9" measured around four fingers at the knuckles)
notes: the moss stitch fingerless gloves feature, of course, moss stitch! these gloves use a slip stitch ribbing for a tighter, yet stretchy, fit around the wrists. sizes range from typical women's medium up to men's large - this equals measurements ranging from 7-9" when measured around the knuckles of the four fingers. optional flaps finish it off! this pattern is free on my blog, or you may purchase an ad-free pdf copy here!
